briefTitle: A Study to Look at Tapentadol Tablets in Children and Adolescents in Pain
officialTitle: An Open-label Trial, Enrolling Subjects Aged 6 Years to Less Than 18 Years Suffering From Pain Requiring Prolonged Release Opioid Treatment, to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Tapentadol PR Versus Morphine PR, Followed by an Open-label Extension

arms.label: Tapentadol in Part 2 after Tapentadol or Morphine in Part 1
Observation Period after Tapentadol in Part 1
Observation Period after Morphine in Part 1
Observation Period after Tapentadol in Part 2

summary: Tapentadol has already been studied in adults. This study is needed to find out if tapentadol works and is safe to use in children and adolescents with long-term pain.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Classified as Responder (Part 1)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Day 1 up to Day 14 (End of Part 1)
